title: nf-core/updhmm pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input - Family trio VCF and SV data

fam_id.errorMessage: Family ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces

proband_id.errorMessage: Proband ID must contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, dots, or hyphens

mother_id.errorMessage: Mother ID must contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, dots, or hyphens

father_id.errorMessage: Father ID must contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, dots, or hyphens

path_vcf_proband.errorMessage: Proband VCF file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf.gz'

path_vcf_mother.errorMessage: Mother VCF file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf.gz'

path_vcf_father.errorMessage: Father VCF file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf.gz'

path_sv_proband.errorMessage: Proband SV file must have extension '.bed' or be '-' if not available

path_sv_mother.errorMessage: Mother SV file must have extension '.bed' or be '-' if not available

path_sv_father.errorMessage: Father SV file must have extension '.bed' or be '-' if not available
